content.question: In lines 2-3, ille quidem plenus annis abit, plenus honoribus is translated

choices.label: that man indeed departs, full of years, full of honors
approaching his fill of years, that man was indeed full of honors
that certain man departs with full years and full honors
approaching his fill of years, that certain man was full of honors

content.answer: that man indeed departs, full of years, full of honors

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
